Articles.Content:
Is there a mod or tool one can use to try to plan multi-body encounters?  

The real world analogy would be a probe sent to flyby Mars and then passes Jupiter then goes on to Saturn, etc...
Going to move this to Add on discussion.
the two I know of are flyby finder and KSPTOT.
Excellent!  Thank you!  I will look into both of those add-ons!
